name: Sylvie’s Salmon Burgers

ingredients.name: Honey Mustard or Sweet & Spicy Mustard
Herb & Garlic Dip Mix or Lemon Dilly Dip Mix

preparation:
1. Stir potatoes with 3 Onion Dip Mix, 1 tbsp mustard, Herb & Garlic Dip mix, sea salt, black pepper, and egg.
  2. Fold in salmon and let mixture sit for 5 min.
  3. Divide salmon mixture into desired number of burgers. Wet hands to prevent sticking and form into patties. Wrap with plastic and chill in refrigerator for at least 1 hour, or overnight.
  4. Lightly spray frying pan with vegetable or olive oil. Pan-fry burgers over medium heat for 5 min per side, or until heated through.
  5. Stir mayonnaise with remaining mustard, lemon juice, capers, Lemon Dilly Dip Mix and minced garlic. Spoon over cooked burgers.
